name: Oranges and Arugula
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: appetizer, side dish, arugula, orange, dairy-free, gluten-free, low calorie, low cholesterol, low-fat, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Trim tough stems from arugula. Wash, dry and slice arugula into thin strips.
Peel oranges over the bowl in which the salad will be served, cutting each section in half and allowing juices to fall into bowl with the halved sections.
In the bowl, stir in the mustard and soy sauce.
